Event.label: Notification Event

SubElement.label: Notification Event Parameter
SubElement.Description: Defines a parameter that represents a part of the notification message structure.

Event.Description:
The Notification Event is a System Event which is triggered when a Push Notification is received by the mobile application.

The specific properties of the Notification Event are:
Notification Event Name
Identifies the notification message for which the event is listening and it must be one of the names used in the Notification Name property of a Send Notification operation.
This event does not have any incoming flow and it cannot be set as protected element.
Event.OutputDescription: The default parameter that represents the title of the notification message.
The default parameter that represents the notification message.
The name of the parameters added on the Notification Event.
